desc: Building on skills gained through Music 111 and 112, third-semester music majors develop more advanced competencies: sight-singing more chromatic melodies and melodies that modulate; identifying and notating progressively complex melodic, rhythmic, and harmonic idioms. Prerequisites: Music 112/114. Co-requisite: Music 213. Offered annually in the fall semester.
name: Aural Skills III
notes: Students in 211A must also register for 213A.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Music 112/114. Co-requisite: Music 213. Offered annually in the fall semester.
